summary: A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".
cast: Julia Roberts|I. Gusti Ayu Puspawati|Hadi Subiyanto|Billy Crudup|Viola Davis|A. title: Come Reza Ama
